org.codemonkey.swiftsocketclient
Class ServerEndpointTCP

java.lang.Object
  org.codemonkey.swiftsocketclient.ServerEndpoint
      org.codemonkey.swiftsocketclient.ServerEndpointTCP

 class ServerEndpointTCP
extends ServerEndpoint

Simply delegates all calls to the Socket. This is because the ServerEndpointUDP is modeled after the TCP version.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Benny Bottema

Field Detail

socket

private final Socket socket

reader

private final BufferedReader reader
The input stream from the server on which we're waiting for data. Data is being read with BufferedReader.readLine(), so incoming messages need to end with a newline character '\n'. In addition, to work with Flex clients, an additional NULL character '\0' needs to be added.

Constructor Detail

                  throws IOException
Creates a BufferedReader for the socket's input stream.

Parameters:
socket - The open socket on which to listen for TCP messages.
Throws:
IOException - Thrown by Socket.getInputStream().
